item.title: Una lunga fila di croci
item.description: No Room To Die is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Garrone.

item.title: Django the Bastard
item.description: Django the Bastard, also known as The Strangers Gundown, is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Garrone. This Gothic-themed Spaghetti Western took advantage of the success of Sergio Corbucci's film Django, hence its title. A similar spaghetti western is the 1967 film Django Kill.

item.title: Degueyo
item.description: Degueyo is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuseppe Vari.

item.title: Terrible Day of the Big Gundown
item.description: Terrible Day of the Big Gundown is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Garrone.
